resources.string: %1$s screams like crazy: There is not a field!
%1$s ands there and shakes his head: There is no field in front of me!
%1$s ands there and shakes his head: There is no field in behind me!
ands there and shakes his head: There is no field in front of me!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: There is no bucket!
% 1 $ s stands there and shakes his head: I have to eat first!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: There\'s nothing to smoke here!
